description: This is a React component file defining a 'Column' component for a drag-and-drop task board UI. It imports React and react-beautiful-dnd components, along with internal dependencies such as TaskCard, theme, and DndPortal. The component renders a styled column with droppable area for tasks, which are draggable elements, handling validation of its ID and integrating with the drag-and-drop context.

methods.name: Column({ column, tasks = [], onEditTask })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a draggable column with tasks, supporting drag-and-drop via react-beautiful-dnd. It manages droppable ID validation and renders each task as a Draggable component, optionally portal-rendering while dragging.

ctags.name: Column
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Column({ column, tasks = [], onEditTask }) {$/
